# null_ignore_me-1685487306

This model is a fine-tuned version of [Sunbird/t5-base-intermediate-2-merged](https://huggingface.co/Sunbird/t5-base-intermediate-2-merged) on the None dataset.
It achieves the following results on the evaluation set:
- eval_loss: 3.2728

- eval_BLEU_teo: 8.7934

- eval_steps_per_second: 1.742
- step: 0
